elements.label: Bizerta [docked]
elements.description: On the Northernmost tip of Africa, lies a port founded by the Phoenicians. Where Carthage is dust on dust, Bizerte thrives and glitters.

elements.label: Constantinople [docked]
elements.description: Ancient history and recent Strife. But the hundred thousand cats of the city remain, and so does its grandeur, and its noise.

elements.label: Dockside Warehouse [docked]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Dockside Warehouse
elements.description: Where criminals have access to the sea, strange and valuable things accrue.

elements.label: Salvage Mission [docked]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Salvage Mission
elements.description: A shipwreck in some ill-fortuned waters have left sailors abuzz with stories of its cargo. If we can salvage something from the @#mariner.shipnameid|9|Bella Sonata#mariner.shipnameid|8|Vengeful Spirit#mariner.shipnameid|7|Cerberus#mariner.shipnameid|6|Olympic#mariner.shipnameid|5|Ventus Excitor#mariner.shipnameid|4|USS Abraham Lincoln#mariner.shipnameid|3|Chimaera#mariner.shipnameid|2|Dazzler#mariner.shipnameid|1|Hispaniola@, it might be very worth our while.

elements.label: Salvage Mission

elements.label: Rescue Mission
elements.description: A shipwreck has been reported recently, and it the company has placed a reward out on who ever can bring back the missing crewmembers, who are stranded, somewhere on an island.
